meaningMnemonic: <radical>Fire</radical> is one of a <radical>few</radical> things you'll need to <kanji>fry</kanji> things.
readingMnemonic: You love to <kanji>fry</kanji> things and are also an adventurous <reading>eater</reading> (いた). This means you'll fry and eat just about anything. Fried ostrich, fried alligator, fried chocolate, you name it!
